verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am thinking today of that beautiful land I shall reach when the sun goeth down; When thro' wonderful grace by my Savior I stand, Will there be any stars in my crown?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Will there be any stars, any stars in my crown When at evening the sun goeth down? When I wake with the blest In the mansions of rest, Will there be any stars in my crown?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the strength of the Lord let me labor and pray, Let me watch as a winner of souls; That bright stars may be mine in the glorious day, When His praise like the sea-billow rolls.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, what joy it will be when His face I behold, Living gems at His feet to lay down; It would sweeten my bliss in the city of gold, Should there be any stars in my crown.
